name: MarsSounds
0:
”Alexa open Mars Sounds”
”Alexa ask Mars Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mars sounds
des:
Transport yourself to the Red Planet with the Mars Sounds skill. Experience the eerie silence and occasional whispers of wind captured by interplanetary missions, bringing the desolate yet fascinating Martian landscape into your living space. Perfect for curiosity-driven minds and space enthusiasts seeking to immerse themselves in the sounds of another world.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Mars Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
